title: Malignant neoplasm: Malignant melanoma of scalp and neck
block: Melanoma and other malignant neoplasms of skin
inclusion: morphology codes M872-M879 with behaviour code /3
exclusion: malignant melanoma of skin of genital organs
symptoms: growth of a new pigmented lesion
itching or pain in a mole
bleeding or oozing from a lesion
